page.title: 19Entertainment
page.content: {(THE HARBOROUGH THEATRE)}offthe Market square,is run by an amateur group.The theatre seats 118, and presents six shows per season.The theatre is also used for jazz evenings ,exhibitions, jumble sales and coffee mornings etc. {(THE HARBOROUGH FOLK CLUB)}meets in the adult lounge (Welland Park Sch.)fortnightly.Entertainment is provided by local amateurs.{(SPARKLES {DISCO)}open nightly except on Sundays, is above the CO-OP on the High Street. {(THE CARNIVAL)}held annually in June, processes through the town to Welland Park where in 1985 the events and stalls were staged.This years main attractions included an aerobatic display team,parachute jumps and hot air baloon rides.{(HARBOROUGH AMATEUR {OPERATIC SOCIETY)}presents modern and traditional shows.
